system.label: System
system.comment: When switching the system, please set the right merchant ID and SOAP password!

merchantid.label: Merchant ID
merchantid.comment: The Merchant ID provided by mPAY24

soap_pass.label: SOAP password
soap_pass.comment: The SOAP password provided by mPAY24

payments_active.label: Payment systems
payments_active.comment: Your customers can choose the payment system in the shop only by 'Custom configuration'! The payment systems will be synchronized when the settings are saved!

form_template.label: Payment system selection
form_template.comment: Choose the way the mPAY24 systems are shown in the fronend (checkout)

forced_preselection.label: Forced preselection
forced_preselection.comment: Your customers must choose the payment system before they are forwarded to mPAY24 in order to be possible to charge the specific payment system.

payment_action.label: Automatic clearing for credit card payments

billingAddressMode.label: Billing address mode
billingAddressMode.comment: The mode 'ReadWrite' will only work if the parameter 'BILLING_ADDR' was set by mPAY24. Please contact the mPAY24 Support: support@mpay24.com!

show_free_products.label: Show free products
show_free_products.comment: Show the free 'children' products of configurable products in the mPAY24 shopping cart
